G Maxwell - Confidential
Any female under the age of 18, did you invite them to come to Jeffrey's home?
MR. PAGLIUCA: Object to the form and foundation.
A. Again, as I said, I am not aware of inviting anybody other than friends of mine who have children to the house.
Q. Did you invite Virginia Giuffre to come to Jeffrey Epstein's home when she was under the age of 18?
MR. PAGLIUCA: Object to the form and foundation.
A. Virginia Roberts held herself out as a masseuse and invited herself to come and give a massage.
Q. My question is, did you invite Virginia Roberts when she was under the age of 18 to come to Jeffrey Epstein's home?
MR. PAGLIUCA: Object to the form and foundation.
A. Again, Virginia Roberts was a masseuse --
Q. I'm asking not asking if she was a masseuse. I'm asking if you invited her to
